Changelog

review 3.0.0

New features and changes

  • Functions were carried over from the previous review package version 2.5, including: logAccept(), logAssign(), logCreate(), logPending() and logSummary().

  • diffQced() and diffPreviousRevisions() allow the user to view the differences between versions of files. diffQced() determines the difference using the local copy of the file and the most recently QCed version.

  • getQcedRevision() returns the revision number for a file that’s been added to the QC log.

Contents

Developed by Eric Anderson, Michael McDermott, Tim Bergsma.
